cards.title: ('Printer host connectivity test failed ({0})
cards.explanation: This card indicates '('Printer host connectivity test failed ({0})'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates '('Printer host connectivity test failed ({0})'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scripts.name: DNS checks
scripts.code:
$d=(Get-CimInstance Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain
Get-DnsClientServerAddress -AddressFamily IPv4
Resolve-DnsName -Type SRV _ldap._tcp.dc._msdcs.$d -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
